text: Ezɨ Godɨn Ikiavɨra Itim gumazamizibar nguibamɨn a batoke, ezɨ an nɨghnɨzim, gumaziba nɨghnɨzi moghɨn nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ, an asɨzibar mɨn nɨghnɨsi. Egha a ghua donkiba ko ikia, bulmakaubar mɨn dadaba apava, puram azenan akui. Ezɨ dɨmagarimɨn ghuariar dɨpaba a giri. Ezɨ a kamaghɨn amua ghua gɨn a kamaghɨn fo, Godɨn Bar Pɨn Itim gumazamiziba bar me gativagha men gari. Egha a uabɨ uan ifongiamɨn gumaziba mɨsevima me atrivibar otifi.
